segments.text: My goodness ! She is thirty seconds faster than the world record in 5000 metres race .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , what did you say ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A Chinese girl has broken the world record in the Olympic Games .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's incredible . I can't believe it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to . It is sure .
segments.speaker: S1
